name: Yallaiah Onteru

Proven track record of delivering production-quality code with minimal supervision, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams, and adapting to Agile development methodologies.

responsibilities: Designed, developed, and maintained responsive web applications using Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Built, extended, and optimized back-end services using Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy, and Swagger/OpenAPI.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deliver new features into production.
Wrote clean, efficient, and well-documented code following best practices.
